comments.author: Dan Leatherman
comments.message: This really bridges the gap between sites that care about movies like rotten tomatoes and sites that don't give two hoots whether or not the movie was good. Nice work!

comments.author: Les Chaps
comments.message:
You are about 35 minutes to fame and fortune, at least according to this:

http://www.businessinsider....

Quick! Add context menu API fu and wait for the cash to roll in!

Good extension. In a world where movie domains are trying to maintain their walled gardens, we need ladders like this!

comments.message: Installed chrome just for this plugin, thanks!
